title: Brazil hospitals buckle in absence of national virus plan
content:
1. Brazil hospitals buckle in absence of national virus plan  The Associated Press
  2. Brazil plunges into crisis as a second wave and deadly new variant overwhelm hospitals  CNN
  3. Brazil Covid deaths top 2,000 in 24 hours  Yahoo News
  4. Brazil, Hit by Covid-19 Variant, Surpasses U.S. in Daily Cases and Deaths  The Wall Street Journal
  5. Covid-19: Brazil experts issue warning as hospitals 'close to collapse'  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
